Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Relates to equal employment opportunity and affirmative action for classified civil service positions in the service of the state
Summary: Relates to implementing equal employment opportunity and affirmative action for classified civil service positions in the service of the state; requires that each agency have a full-time affirmative action officer who reports directly to the agency head.
LawCode: Add Art 2 Title A-1 §§13 - 13-e, Civ Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the civil service law, in relation to implementing equal employment opportunity and affirmative action for classified civil service positions in the service of the state
